error_invalid_link_desc: The share link format is invalid. Please check the link and try again.
error_expired_link_desc: This share link has expired and is no longer valid.
error_kb_not_found_desc: The knowledge base has been deleted or is no longer available.
error_load_failed_desc: Unable to load the shared knowledge base. Please try again later.
pending_approval_desc: Your access request is pending approval from the knowledge base owner.
read_only_notice: This is a publicly shared knowledge base. Login to apply for access.
view_permission_desc: Can view documents in this knowledge base
edit_permission_desc: Can view and edit documents in this knowledge base
request_submitted_desc: Your access request has been submitted. Please wait for the owner's approval.
already_have_access_desc: You already have access to this knowledge base.
cannot_join_own_desc: You cannot apply for access to your own knowledge base.
